author: Simon Difford
description: Orange juice adds fruity dilution to what could also be called a Breakfast Margarita. Sir Paul McCartney (yup of Beatles fame) likes his Margaritas made with a splash of freshly squeezed orange juice (preferably clementine juice), hence this recipe is named in his honour.
name: Macca Margarita

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
